Comment: Yeah but he saw a movie about it and it looked like a cool plan.   Once housed the most dangerous criminals? The Hopi 19, the group of native men who refused to send their children to boarding school were sent there for a whole year. Frank Bolt, a navy man, was sent there because he was gay. Was given the title of inmate #1 by the president at the time just so everyone would know how much our country hated gay people. Okay, Al Capone and whoever else were sent there too but he needs to stop. It was closed because it was too expensive to run and that was before plumbing or anyone giving a shit about fair treatment of prisoners. It’s impossible. Alcatraz will never be a prison again and it would be a hell of a lot easier to escape now that people own boats and dry suits and all the things you would need to get away from it. So dumb.
